# LeafProperty.ProcessorInfoAndFeatures.Features.FMA property

Gets a value representing the key to retrieve the property value.

Fused multiply-add. A value of true indicates the processor supports FMA extensions using YMM state.

Key Composition

* Leaf: ProcessorInfoAndFeatures
* Property: FMA
* Unit: None

Return Value

Type: Boolean

```csharp
public static IPropertyKey FMA { get; }
```
